reviewText: Every time I watch this DVD I am transported back to the Joanie Madden Folk'n Irish Cruise of 2014 inwhich the Makem and Spain Brothers were one of the headline groups.

I have been a fan of this group from the moment I heard their first song.  The voices are wonderful and varied.  Their accompaniment is excellent, but I also love to hear their unaccompanied voices.  Perhaps folk music will go on for more generations!
